description: run_tests.sh by default uses a virtual environment to run the tests, but this is not applied to run_tests.sh -p. The fix should be that pep8 is run in the same environment as the tests. Therefore, run_tests.sh -p -N should run just pep8 in the local environment, etc.
title: PEP8 in run_tests.sh does not use virtual env
